    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassModifierMatcher

        public ClassModifierMatcher(int expectedModifier,
                            boolean strict)
        Creates a matcher for class modifiers.
        Parameters:
        expectedModifier - modifiers to validate
        strict - if true, all given modifiers must be set, if false at least these modifiers must be set
